author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 17-year-old boy reportedly committed suicide, after writing a letter to his parents and friends, stating that he feared appearing for the Board exam on Monday.

A senior official of the Chennai City Police said S. Monish Sundar, a resident of Subramanya Swamy Koil Street in Saidapet, was studying in Class 12 of a private school in Gopalapuram.

The student was not confident of scoring good marks in the Central Board of Secondary Education exams, which started on March 1 (Tuesday), and committed suicide by hanging himself in the house.

His body was sent to Government Royapettah Hospital for post mortem.

Sneha’s suicide prevention helpline can be reached at 044-24640050/ 60.
title: Class 12 student commits suicide
